github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Use Conventional Commit messages strictly following the specification.
Commit message format: <type>(<scope>): <description>. Add a body for context and a footer for BREAKING CHANGE or issue references.
Types allowed: feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, perf, test, build, ci, chore, revert.
Be extremely detailed with the file changes and the reason for the change
If relevant, include a body that explains why the change was made and its impact, not just what changed.

Examples: feat(parser): add ability to parse arrays; fix(ui): correct button alignment; docs: update README with usage instructions; refactor: improve performance of data processing; chore: update dependencies.
